link_desc:
Website metrics.

The basic metrics that you need to get from a website:

Site accessibility: speed of opening the page, time of page loading, checking of the keyword on the page;

Watch the domain name so as not to miss the term of its payment and the site is not blocked by the registrar;

Watch the SSL certificate that is installed on the site, as it also needs to be updated in advance.

Support Zabbix Server version : 2, 3.4
author: Itmicus
